notes: Third generation Sprinter. Available in multiple wheelbases (144", 170", 170" EXT) and roof heights. 1500/2500/3500/4500 weight ratings. Diesel models require DEF and DPF maintenance. 4-cylinder diesel introduced 2023. eSprinter electric variant available 2023+. Requires Mercedes STAR diagnostic system for proper service. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mercedes-Benz Sprinter article, January 2025 revision.

Midsize commercial van (rebadged Vito for North America). Positioned between Transit Connect and Sprinter. Cargo and passenger configurations with 5-8 seat options. Discontinued in North America after 2023 model year. Replaced by eSprinter for commercial applications. Data sourced from Wikipedia Mercedes-Benz Vito article, January 2025 revision.
